title: Chicken Pot Pie
steps: Poach chicken in simmering water until cooked, 15-20 minutes. Shred.
Melt butter, cook onion, carrots, celery until soft, 8 minutes.
Add flour, cook 1 minute. Whisk in broth and cream.
Simmer until thickened. Add chicken, peas, thyme. Season well.
Transfer to 9x13 dish. Top with puff pastry, cut vents. Brush with egg.
Bake at 400°F until golden and bubbling, 25-30 minutes.
notes: Thighs have more flavor than breasts.
Puff pastry is easier than pie dough.
